verses.verse: For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G2309>would<s%> that <S%G5209>ye<s%> <S%G1492>knew<s%> what <S%G2245>great<s%> <S%G73>conflict<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> for <S%G3588>them<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2993>Laodicea,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> for as many <S%G3745>as<s%> have <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh;<s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> might be <S%G3870>comforted,<s%> being knit <S%G4822>together<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4149>riches<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> full <S%G4136>assurance<s%> of <S%G4907>understanding,<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1922>acknowledgement<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>
In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G614>hid<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2344>treasures<s%> of <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge.<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> I <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G3363>lest<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> should <S%G3884>beguile<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> enticing <S%G4086>words.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>though<s%> <S%G2532><s%> I be <S%G548>absent<s%> in <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> I <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> in <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G5463>joying<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G991>beholding<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5010>order,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4733>steadfastness<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> ye have <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3880>received<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> so <S%G4043>walk<s%> ye <S%G1722>in<s%> him: <S%G846><s%>

Rooted <S%G4492><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> built <S%G2026>up<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G950>established<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> ye have been <S%G1321>taught,<s%> <S%G4052>abounding<s%> <S%G1722>therein<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G2169>thanksgiving.<s%>

Beware <S%G991><s%> <S%G3361>lest<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G4812>spoil<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G5385>philosophy<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2756>vain<s%> <S%G539>deceit,<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3862>tradition<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4747>rudiments<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2730>dwelleth<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4138>fullness<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2320>Godhead<s%> <S%G4985>bodily.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> ye <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G4137>complete<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G746>principality<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> power: <S%G1849><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> ye are <S%G4059>circumcised<s%> with the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> made without <S%G886>hands,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> putting <S%G555>off<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> of Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

Buried <S%G4916>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G908>baptism,<s%> <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> ye are risen <S%G4891>with<s%> him <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1753>operation<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> who hath <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> your <S%G3900>sins<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> hath he quickened <S%G4806>together<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> having <S%G5483>forgiven<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3900>trespasses;<s%>

Blotting <S%G1813>out<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5498>handwriting<s%> of <S%G1378>ordinances<s%> that was <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G2257>us,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G5227>contrary<s%> to <S%G2254>us,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G142>took<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3319>way,<s%> <S%G4338>nailing<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> to his <S%G4716>cross;<s%>

And having <S%G554>spoiled<s%> <S%G746>principalities<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1849>powers,<s%> he made a <S%G1165>show<s%> of them <S%G1722>openly,<s%> <S%G3954><s%> triumphing <S%G2358>over<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G848>it.<s%>

Let <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1035>meat,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4213>drink,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3313>respect<s%> of a holy <S%G1859>day,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of the new <S%G3561>moon,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> days:
Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> a <S%G4639>shadow<s%> of things to <S%G3195>come;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> is of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

Let no <S%G3367>man<s%> beguile you of your <S%G2603>reward<s%> <S%G5209><s%> in a voluntary <S%G2309>humility<s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5012><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2356>worshiping<s%> of <S%G32>angels,<s%> intruding <S%G1687>into<s%> those things <S%G3739>which<s%> he hath <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3708>seen,<s%> <S%G1500>vainly<s%> puffed <S%G5448>up<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G4561>fleshly<s%> <S%G3563>mind,<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2902>holding<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2776>Head,<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G860>joints<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4886>bands<s%> having nourishment <S%G2023>ministered,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> knit <S%G4822>together,<s%> <S%G837>increaseth<s%> with <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G838>increase<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> ye be <S%G599>dead<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4747>rudiments<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G5101>why,<s%> as <S%G5613>though<s%> <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> are ye subject to <S%G1379>ordinances,<s%>
(Touch <S%G680><s%> <S%G3361>not;<s%> <S%G1089>taste<s%> <S%G3366>not;<s%> <S%G2345>handle<s%> <S%G3366>not;<s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> to <S%G1519>perish<s%> <S%G5356><s%> with <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G671>using;)<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1778>commandments<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1319>doctrines<s%> of <S%G444>men?<s%>

Which <S%G3748>things<s%> <S%G2076>have<s%> <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> a <S%G3056>show<s%> of <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1479>will-worship,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5012>humility,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G857>neglecting<s%> of the <S%G4983>body;<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G4140>satisfying<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>
